issue.title: Fix error handling in authentication system
issue.body:
When a user enters special characters in their username, the authentication system fails with a 500 error instead of properly validating and returning a user-friendly message.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Try to log in with a username containing characters like `<`, `>`, or `&`
2. System crashes with internal server error

Expected behavior: The system should sanitize inputs and return a proper validation error.
